segment.source: The hub control uses a hierarchical navigation pattern to support apps with a relational information architecture.
segment.target: The hub control uses a hierarchical navigation pattern to support apps with a relational information architecture.

segment.source: Hub controls
segment.target: Hub controls

segment.source: Hub control/pattern
segment.target: Hub control/pattern

segment.source: A hub control lets you organize app content into distinct, yet related, sections or categories.
segment.target: A hub control lets you organize app content into distinct, yet related, sections or categories.

segment.source: Sections in a hub are meant to be traversed in a preferred order, and can serve as the starting point for more detailed experiences.
segment.target: Sections in a hub are meant to be traversed in a preferred order, and can serve as the starting point for more detailed experiences.

segment.source: Example of a hub
segment.target: Example of a hub

segment.source: Content in a hub can be displayed in a robust panning view that allows users to get a glimpse of what's new, what's available, and what's relevant.
segment.target: Content in a hub can be displayed in a robust panning view that allows users to get a glimpse of what's new, what's available, and what's relevant.

segment.source: Hubs typically have a page header, while multiple content sections each get a section header.
segment.target: Hubs typically have a page header, while multiple content sections each get a section header.

segment.source: The hub control has several features that make it work well for building a content navigation pattern.
segment.target: The hub control has several features that make it work well for building a content navigation pattern.

segment.source: Visual navigation
segment.target: Visual navigation

segment.source: A hub allows content to be displayed in a diverse, brief, easy-to-scan array.
segment.target: A hub allows content to be displayed in a diverse, brief, easy-to-scan array.

segment.source: Categorization
segment.target: Categorization

segment.source: Each hub section allows for its content to be arranged in a logical order.
segment.target: Each hub section allows for its content to be arranged in a logical order.

segment.source: Mixed content types
segment.target: Mixed content types

segment.source: With mixed content types, variable asset sizes and ratios are common.
segment.target: With mixed content types, variable asset sizes and ratios are common.

segment.source: A hub allows each content type to be uniquely and neatly laid out in each hub section.
segment.target: A hub allows each content type to be uniquely and neatly laid out in each hub section.

segment.source: Variable page and content widths
segment.target: Variable page and content widths

segment.source: Being a panoramic model, the hub allows for variability in its section widths.
segment.target: Being a panoramic model, the hub allows for variability in its section widths.

segment.source: This is great for content of different depths, and allows a small-to-high number of items to format equally well.
segment.target: This is great for content of different depths, and allows a small-to-high number of items to format equally well.

segment.source: Flexible architecture
segment.target: Flexible architecture

segment.source: If you'd prefer to keep your app architecture shallow, you can fit all channel content into a hub section summary.
segment.target: If you'd prefer to keep your app architecture shallow, you can fit all channel content into a hub section summary.

segment.source: Important APIs
segment.target: Important APIs

segment.source: Hub class (XAML)
segment.target: Hub class (XAML)

segment.source: HubSection class (XAML)
segment.target: HubSection class (XAML)

segment.source: Hub object (HTML)
segment.target: Hub object (HTML)

segment.source: Is this the right control?
segment.target: Is this the right control?

segment.source: The hub control works well for displaying large amounts of content that is arranged in a hierarchy.
segment.target: The hub control works well for displaying large amounts of content that is arranged in a hierarchy.

segment.source: Hubs prioritize the browsing and discovery of new content, making them useful for displaying items in a store or a media collection.
segment.target: Hubs prioritize the browsing and discovery of new content, making them useful for displaying items in a store or a media collection.

segment.source: A hub is just one of several navigation elements you can use; to learn more about navigation patterns and the other navigation elements, see the Navigation design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: A hub is just one of several navigation elements you can use; to learn more about navigation patterns and the other navigation elements, see the Navigation design basics for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: Hub architecture
segment.target: Hub architecture

segment.source: The hub control has a hierarchical navigation pattern that support apps with a relational information architecture.
segment.target: The hub control has a hierarchical navigation pattern that support apps with a relational information architecture.

segment.source: A hub consists of different categories of content, each of which maps to the app's section pages.
segment.target: A hub consists of different categories of content, each of which maps to the app's section pages.

segment.source: Section pages can be displayed in any form that best represents the scenario and content that the section contains.
segment.target: Section pages can be displayed in any form that best represents the scenario and content that the section contains.

segment.source: wireframe of a hierarchical Food with Friends app
segment.target: wireframe of a hierarchical Food with Friends app

segment.source: Layouts and panning/scrolling
segment.target: Layouts and panning/scrolling

segment.source: There are a number of ways to lay out and navigate content in a hub; just be sure that content lists in a hub always pan in a direction perpendicular to the direction in which the hub scrolls.
segment.target: There are a number of ways to lay out and navigate content in a hub; just be sure that content lists in a hub always pan in a direction perpendicular to the direction in which the hub scrolls.

segment.source: Horizontal panning
segment.target: Horizontal panning

segment.source: Example of a horizontally panning hubVertical panning
segment.target: Example of a horizontally panning hubVertical panning

segment.source: Example of a vertically panning hubHorizontal panning with vertically scrolling list/grid
segment.target: Example of a vertically panning hubHorizontal panning with vertically scrolling list/grid

segment.source: Example of a horizontally panning hub with a vertically scrolling listVertical panning with horizontally scrolling list/grid
segment.target: Example of a horizontally panning hub with a vertically scrolling listVertical panning with horizontally scrolling list/grid

segment.source: Example of a horizontally panning hub
segment.target: Example of a horizontally panning hub

segment.source: Examples
segment.target: Examples

segment.source: The hub provides a great deal of design flexibility.
segment.target: The hub provides a great deal of design flexibility.

segment.source: This lets you design apps that have a wide variety of compelling and visually rich experiences.
segment.target: This lets you design apps that have a wide variety of compelling and visually rich experiences.

segment.source: You can use a hero image or content section for the first group; a large image for the hero can be cropped both vertically and horizontally without losing the center of interest.
segment.target: You can use a hero image or content section for the first group; a large image for the hero can be cropped both vertically and horizontally without losing the center of interest.

segment.source: Here is an example of a single hero image and how that image may be cropped for landscape, portrait, and narrow width.
segment.target: Here is an example of a single hero image and how that image may be cropped for landscape, portrait, and narrow width.

segment.source: hero image cropped for different window sizes
segment.target: hero image cropped for different window sizes

segment.source: On mobile devices, one hub section is visible at a time.
segment.target: On mobile devices, one hub section is visible at a time.

segment.source: Example of a hub pattern on a small screen
segment.target: Example of a hub pattern on a small screen

segment.source: Recommendations
segment.target: Recommendations

segment.source: To let users know that there's more content in a hub section, we recommend clipping the content so that a certain amount of it peeks.
segment.target: To let users know that there's more content in a hub section, we recommend clipping the content so that a certain amount of it peeks.

segment.source: Based on the needs of your app, you can add several hub sections to the hub control, with each one offering its own functional purpose.
segment.target: Based on the needs of your app, you can add several hub sections to the hub control, with each one offering its own functional purpose.

segment.source: For example, one section could contain a series of links and controls, while another could be a repository for thumbnails.
segment.target: For example, one section could contain a series of links and controls, while another could be a repository for thumbnails.

segment.source: A user can pan between these sections using the gesture support built into the hub control.
segment.target: A user can pan between these sections using the gesture support built into the hub control.

segment.source: Having content dynamically reflow is the best way to accommodate different window sizes.
segment.target: Having content dynamically reflow is the best way to accommodate different window sizes.

segment.source: If you have many hub sections, consider adding semantic zoom.
segment.target: If you have many hub sections, consider adding semantic zoom.

segment.source: This also makes it easier to find sections when the app is resized to a narrow width.
segment.target: This also makes it easier to find sections when the app is resized to a narrow width.

segment.source: We recommend not having an item in a hub section lead to another hub; instead, you can use interactive headers to navigate to another hub section or page.
segment.target: We recommend not having an item in a hub section lead to another hub; instead, you can use interactive headers to navigate to another hub section or page.

segment.source: The hub is a starting point and is meant to be customized to fit the needs of your app.
segment.target: The hub is a starting point and is meant to be customized to fit the needs of your app.

segment.source: You can change the following aspects of a hub:
segment.target: You can change the following aspects of a hub:

segment.source: Number of sections
segment.target: Number of sections

segment.source: Type of content in each section
segment.target: Type of content in each section

segment.source: Placement and order of sections
segment.target: Placement and order of sections

segment.source: Size of sections
segment.target: Size of sections

segment.source: Spacing between sections
segment.target: Spacing between sections

segment.source: Spacing between a section and the top or bottom of the hub
segment.target: Spacing between a section and the top or bottom of the hub

segment.source: Text style and size in headers and content
segment.target: Text style and size in headers and content

segment.source: Color of the background, sections, section headers, and section content
segment.target: Color of the background, sections, section headers, and section content
